item.title: Meta-analytic Bayesian structural equation modeling
item.description: There is a non-pay-walled version below, but the version of record is available at the Structural Equation Modeling, http://www.tandfonline.com/10.1080/10705511.2022.2142128. Here’s the PDF and OSF repository with simulation and data analyses code in R.
